Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are resuming their normal routing, via the subway. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are resuming their normal routing, via the subway.

Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays at Chicago following an earlier track conditions problems.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses are available until 0130 hours to provide connecting service between Fullerton and Lake in both directions.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Resumes in Subway
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line service has resumed via subway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are resuming their normal routing, via the subway.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Blue Island/Wolcott
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Blue Island, Damen, Cermak and Ashland: due to, a festival near Blue Island/Wolcott.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Blue Island, Damen, Cermak, Ashland and over regular route, due to a festival near Blue Island/Wolcott.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 76th, Ashland and 74th: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 76th, Ashland and 74th: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Bus Substitution Between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Shuttle buses replace Blue Line service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Shuttle buses replace rail service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

Trains will run between O’Hare and UIC-Halsted, and between Forest Park and Illinois Medical District.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
We are performing construction at the Racine Blue Line station and Morgan substation.

MAP
